desc:
After a hard day at the office, full of work and appointments in the noisy city, find your Oasis in the middle of the urban jungle with these sneakers: Discover the comfort of our memory foam insole and feel the cold sand in your feets!
-Exterior fabric: 3D mesh, breathable in blue color
-Interior fabric: 3D mesh
-Ergonomic memory foam insole
-Bicolour injected rubber sole in beige
